dbaccess

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbaccess.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Database Connection class provides access to a database. The class contains private fields, used for loading the database, and methods for getting and closing database connections

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DB_URL
      The url which points to a specific database
      private static DBConnection dbConnection
      The single object of this class
      private static java.lang.String DRIVER
      The driver provided by the RDBMS used
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER
      Logger object used for logging possible errors
      private static java.lang.String PASSWORD
      The password of the database user
      private static java.lang.String USER
      The username of the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DBConnection()
      The constructor set the logger level to WARNING and tries to instantiate the driver

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        private java.sql.Connection createConnection()
        Private method which tries to create and return a connection to the database
        Returns:
        Return the created connection. If the database is not accessible returns null

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Method used for getting a connection to the database
        Returns:
        Return the created connection. If the database is not accessible returns null
